meanings.definition: A type of meteorite composed mainly of the mineral pyroxene.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of eucrites found around the world.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study eucrites to learn more about outer space.
meanings.sent3: The eucrites in the exhibit seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The eucrites falling from the sky were like shooting stars.
meanings.sent5: The eucrites glittered under the museum lights, captivating visitors' attention.

meanings.definition: A group of achondrite meteorites that are believed to have originated from the asteroid Vesta.
meanings.sent1: Researchers discovered a cluster of eucrites near the impact site.
meanings.sent2: The eucrites found on Earth provide clues about the asteroid Vesta.
meanings.sent3: The eucrites at the party were the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The eucrites in the sky danced like Vesta's own stars.
meanings.sent5: The eucrites whispered secrets of their journey from Vesta to the scientists.
